name: KoHaTu
description:
Pitch

KoHaTu is a simple, yet challenging, game inspired by early 80s arcade games.

Shoot as many KoHaTus as you can with your mighty bolts before they pile-up and you get hit !

(Wait on the title screen for 5 seconds to watch the tutorial)

Controls

- Press C to add coins and R to Restart

- ARROWS KEYS to move around.

- Press SPACE to shoot

(note : don't play in fullscreen)

Credits

Game made in 48H for the Curious Game Jam 2020.

Made by Luc Dercourt and GrasJambon

Music by Joshua McLean : Mountain Trials.

CTR Shader by xygthop3.
